org.apache.paimon.flink.action.cdc

Class SyncDatabaseActionBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.flink.action.ActionBase
      • org.apache.paimon.flink.action.cdc.SynchronizationActionBase
        • org.apache.paimon.flink.action.cdc.SyncDatabaseActionBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KafkaSyncDatabaseAction, MongoDBSyncDatabaseAction, MySqlSyncDatabaseAction, PulsarSyncDatabaseAction

    public abstract class SyncDatabaseActionBase
extends SynchronizationActionBase
    Base Action for synchronizing into one Paimon database.
